newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK 91-day bills average accepted yield 4.51 pct.
newsitem.headline: HK 91-day bills average accepted yield 4.51 pct.

text.p: The average accepted yield of 91-day Exchange Fund bills at Tuesday's tender was 4.51 percent, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) said.
This compares with three-month HIBOR of 5.48125 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 4.46 percent at the last weekly tender of quarterly bills.
Bids for the HK$2 billion issue was HK$9.39 billion, versus HK$3.68 billion at the previous tender, HKMA said.
